content: materials to make a colorblock bias blanket you will need 7 skeins of yarn - color a 1 skein of koigu s kersti merino crepe 1 100% merino wool each skein is 114 yards/ 50 grams approximately 114 yards required - color b 1 skein of koigu s kersti merino crepe approximately 114 yards required - color c 1 skein of madeline tosh s tosh merino dk 100% merino wool each skein is 225 yards/ 100 grams approximately 225 yards required - color d 1 skein of anzula s cricket 2 80% superwash merino wool 10% cashmere 10% nylon each skein is 250 yards/ 100 grams approximately 250 yards required - color e 1 skein of anzula s cricket approximately 250 yards required - color f 1 skein of madeline tosh s tosh merino dk approximately 225 yards required - color g 1 skein of madeline tosh s tosh merino dk approximately 225 yards required you will also need - us 6 4 mm 32-inch circular needles 3 - 7-inch piece of cardboard or other stiff material for making the tassels optional gauge 22 stitches and 44 row 22 ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch size blanket 33 inches x 33 inches without tassels tassels 6½ inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/kersti-merino-crepe-solid-and-multi html 2 https //www purlsoho com/cricket html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881
